sentences.sContent: The trend of half permanent enterprise management culture towards normalization direction.
sentences.sContent_eng: The trend of half permanent enterprise management culture towards normalization direction.
sentences.sCn: 趋势三半永久企业的经营管理文化将朝正规化方向发展。

sentences.sContent: Our normalization is such that the curves in Fig . 3 can be regarded as probability distributions.
sentences.sContent_eng: Our normalization is such that the curves in Fig . 3 can be regarded as probability distributions.
sentences.sCn: 我们的标准化处理使得图3中的曲线可以被看作概率分布曲线。

synos.tran: [分化]正常化；[标准]标准化；[数]正规化；常态化

words.tran: 规范，基准；定额，分配之工作量
常态；[化学] 当量浓度；[化学] 规定浓度
使正常化；使规格化，使标准化
